title: Modularize Engine Architecture and Dependency Layout
acceptance: New modular directory hierarchy adopted (`engine/core`, `engine/modules`, `engine/platform`, `third_party/{vendored,managed}`) with documentation updated accordingly.
Output directory structure established (`output/renders`, `output/exports`, `output/cache`) to organize generated artifacts, with existing `renders/` migrated to `output/renders/`.
CMake and build tooling reference only the new paths; desktop and web builds succeed from a clean tree.
Temporary compatibility shims or duplicated folders are removed before completion; repository contains no dead `engine/Libraries` or `engine/external` remnants.
Architecture migration plan documents incremental steps, risk mitigations, and rollback instructions.
CI or local build matrix report captured in artifacts/validation/build_matrix.md demonstrating parity with pre-refactor behavior.
.gitignore updated to exclude `output/` directory while preserving structure files (README.md, .gitkeep).
